title: # 10 - Something’s Burning Uncut – The Super Troopers - Steve Lemme & Kevin Heffernan
description:
Today I have Steve Lemme & Kevin Heffernan from Super Troopers over to make McGriddles with maple syrup crack infused into the batter. 

Super Troopers 2 is available to buy now! 

Full Recipe: http://bit.ly/SBMcGriddlesRecipe

Equipment:

Baking sheet

Parchment paper

Grater

Paper towel lined plate

2 frying pans

Mixing bowl

Spatula

2 bowls

Pancake Molds Measuring cups

Measuring spoons

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
